short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Stamina Calculator for CryptoBlades, directly compute all your necessary stamina

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cryptoblade, this plugin allows you to see the time needed to get your stamina stages

PS: This work is in progress, contact me for suggestions and bug reports.  Thanks!
